<page title>: Allen Bradley 2711P T12C4D6 A PanelView Plus CE 1250 Color 128MB Flash RAM Read | eBay
description: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T12C4D6 PanelView Plus CE 1250 Color Terminal 12.1 inch, Touch Screen, Standard Communication (Ethernet and RS-232), 128 MB Flash, 128 MB RAM, DC power, Series A
miscellaneous: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T12C4D6 PanelView Plus CE provides an open platform allowing users to access the Windows CE desktop. This additional functionality allows save time by viewing manuals, training documents and even video directly on operator terminal, access production schedules directly from terminal, improve machine control and simplify setup through a live video from a web camera, remote access to the terminal with VNC (Virtual Network Computing).
specifications: Display: Color Active Matrix TFT; Display Size: 12.1 inch; Resolution: 800 x 600, 18-bit Color Graphics; Software: FactoryTalk View Studio for Machine Edition or Enterprise Series, and open multi-application platform; Memory: 128 MB RAM/128 MB Flash; Touch Screen: Analog resistive; Communication Ports: Ethernet, RS-232, 2 USB; Input Voltage: 18-32V DC (24V DC nominal); Power Consumption: 70 W (2.9 A at 24V DC); Weight: 3.4 kg (7.6 lb); Dimensions (HxWxD): 282 x 363 x 55 mm, 11.12 x 14.30 x 2.18 in.
